sentences: Armand Amar (born 1953) is a French composer, who grew up in Morocco.
He won the 2010 César Award for Best Music for Le Concert (Radu Mihăileanu).
Armand Amar is a French composer living in Paris.
In 1968, he began playing the congas.
He also practiced the tabla and the zarb in the following years.
In 1976 he met South African choreographer Peter Goss, who introduced him to dance.
He founded the label Long Distance in 1994 with his partners Alain Weber and Peter Gabriel.
